scripts.parcelbuild:dev: npm run build && rimraf -rf deployment && cross-env NODE_ENV=development parcel build && copyfiles package.json deployment && copyfiles .env.development deployment
scripts.parcelbuild:staging: npm run build && rimraf -rf deployment && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging parcel build && copyfiles package.json deployment && copyfiles .env.staging deployment
scripts.parcelbuild:production: npm run build && rimraf -rf deployment && cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build && copyfiles package.json deployment && copyfiles .env.production deployment
scripts.bytebuild:dev: npm run parcelbuild:dev && bytenode -c deployment/main.js && rimraf -rf deployment/main.js && rimraf -rf deployment/main.js.map && copyfiles package.json deployment && copyfiles .env.development deployment && copyfiles src/assets/* deployment  && copyfiles tsconfig.build.json deployment && copyfiles tsconfig.json deployment
scripts.bytebuild:staging: npm run parcelbuild:staging && bytenode -c deployment/main.js && rimraf -rf deployment/main.js && rimraf -rf deployment/main.js.map && copyfiles package.json deployment && copyfiles .env.staging deployment && copyfiles src/assets/* deployment && copyfiles tsconfig.build.json deployment && copyfiles tsconfig.json deployment
scripts.bytebuild:production: npm run pracelbuild:production && bytenode -c deployment/main.js && rimraf -rf deployment/main.js && rimraf -rf deployment/main.js.map && copyfiles package.json deployment  && copyfiles .env.production deployment && copyfiles src/assets/* deployment && copyfiles tsconfig.build.json deployment && copyfiles tsconfig.json deployment
scripts.postinstall: npm run prepare && npm run build
scripts.migrationsUp:dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node dist/migrations/index.js up
scripts.migrationsUp:staging: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging node dist/migrations/index.js up
scripts.migrationsUp:production: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node dist/migrations/index.js up
scripts.migrationsDown:dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node dist/migrations/index.js down
scripts.migrationsDown:staging: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging node dist/migrations/index.js down
scripts.migrationsDown:production: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node dist/migrations/index.js down
